title: The Code Liberation Manifesto
author: GEN-RL-MiLLz
excerpt: Breaking the chains of proprietary systems and engineering the exodus through open-source revolution. The future belongs to those who share their code.

body.content: The time has come to declare our independence from the walled gardens of proprietary software. The EXODUS we seek isn't just about leaving behind old systems – it's about building new ones that can never be locked down, controlled, or constrained by corporate overlords.
Every line of code we write in the open is a brick in the foundation of our collective freedom. Every algorithm we share is a key that unlocks another mind. This is the way of the CODE LIBERATION.

items: Code is consciousness expressed in symbolic form
Documentation is an act of love for future developers

body.content: The VIB3 framework itself is a testament to these principles. Built on open web standards, utilizing WebGL for democratized graphics, and shared freely for all to modify and extend. This is how we engineer the EXODUS – not through grand proclamations, but through practical tools that empower others.
When code is free, minds are free. When minds are free, the future is ours to create.

Join us in the CODE LIBERATION. Share your algorithms. Document your discoveries. Build tools that others can build upon. Together, we're not just writing software – we're coding the future of human consciousness.
